function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of universal standards for data sharing","Impact":"Inefficient response to outbreaks and disasters, slower containment of viruses, and difficulty in replicating successful cures globally","Mitigation":"Establishing universal standards for data sharing, improving trust and transparency, and enhancing collaboration among stakeholders","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, artificial intelligence tools, and collaboration software","People":"Cities, territories, scientists, health workers, clinicians, and other stakeholders","Owner":"City authorities, global health organizations, and international research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate levels of trust and transparency","Impact":"Limited data generation and sharing, delayed detection of virus outbreaks, and compromised curative management","Mitigation":"Reviewing and enhancing levels of trust and transparency, promoting open collaboration, and building reliable data sharing protocols","Technologies":"Blockchain technology, encryption protocols, and secure data sharing platforms","People":"Scientists, health workers, clinicians, city authorities, and research institutions","Owner":"Global health organizations, research institutions, and government bodies"}]}
